issues.description: The constructor in the solution repository does not follow the parameter order specified in the UML diagram of the problem statement, which could confuse students who are instructed to match this order exactly. The problem statement requires the order: lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors, but the solution uses: lectureName, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents. This discrepancy might lead students to implement an incorrect order, thinking it aligns with the intended design.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the constructor in the solution repository to match the exact parameter order from the UML diagram in the problem statement: public Lecture(String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors)
